name: Slime World (jamienpixel)
description:
Slime World was made by Riley Cato and Jamie Stuart, the two members of Swan Song, for a Masters Project at Bolton University. this is a local Co-Op only game requiring 2 players about two slimes solving puzzles and trying to free the slime King. this is still a work in progress but we do hope you enjoy our game in its current State. 

Jamie Stuart Portfolio https://stuartjamie35.wixsite.com/gamedesignportfolio
Riley Cato Portfolio (pending)
